page.title: 13A BOWLING CLUB IN SANDY
page.content: SANDY CONSERVATIVE BOWLING CLUB (MENS SECTION) WAS PROBABLY FOUNDED IN 1924. THE LADIES SECTION WAS FOUNDED IN 1947. THERE IS NOW A COMBINED MEMBERSHIP OF 105 MEMBERS. THE GREEN IS A FULL SIZE SIX RINKS EACH WAY, AND IS SITUATED AT THE REAR OF THE CONSERVATIVE CLUB IN BEDFORD ROAD. MEMBERS PLAY FRIENDLY MATCHES AND ALSO ENTER TEAMS IN:- BEDS COUNTY LEAGUE, EAST BEDS LEAGUE, PELL SHIELD, ELPHICK CUP, HARMSWORTH CUP, NAT WEST FOURS, AND THEY ARE AFFILIATED AND COMPETE IN LONDON AND SOUTHERN COUNTIES MATCHES. THERE IS ALSO KEEN PLAY IN THE CLUBS OWN COMPETITIONS. MANY MEMBERS BOTH MEN AND WOMEN HAVE GAINED THEIR COUNTY BADGE. TO GAIN THIS YOU HAVE TO BE SELECTED TO REPRESENT THE COUNTY FOR THREE CONSECUTIVE YEARS.
